name: insurance-voice-bot

examples.text: I want to set up the chat bot for my shop
Do you know who you are?
What should I know about you?
No, i have no such plans
* I have no plan for further journey*
Hello I am looking for some help here
Are you a human or a bot?
Am I talking to a Bot?
Am I talking to a person or am I talking to an AI?
Am I chatting with a human?
Tell me, are you a human or no?
How can you prove you are a human?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

examples.text: It was nice chatting with you
I d like to stop doing this
I want to know theft of personal belongs during travel are covered under my current policy
Is there any way to know the travel theft can be covered under my running policy?
How much does emergency roadside cost?
Do you apply deductions on each product?
Does my patient record get factored into the cost?
Does my dental filling coverage require me to pay up first before it takes effect?
Can you share a list of policy related exclusion?
Why are ambulance charges not considered?
Why is this feature so expensive?
Can I be compensated for all the loss?
What is max allowance on hospital room visit?
Tell me more about increasing income protection
What is the cost of health coverage?
What are the exclusions in my personal liability insurance?
What amount I have to pay if I get a business income coverage?
So what services are not a part of personal liability policy?
I will get back to you later. Thank you
ok thanks. I will get back to you later
I am looking for a travel insurance
can I get a travel insurance
I want a quote for insurance
how can I get a travel insurance
What is the ranking of Apollo?
What is the last year turnover for Apollo Munich
Name of Regulatory body for insurance
What can I ask you to do?
What else can you help me with?
What are you able to deal with?
What kinds of things can you do?
Where can I find the frequently asked questions?
What are my options that you can help with?
What are you able to understand?
How can you solve my problems?
Tell me about what kind of things you do?
Is there anything you can help me with?
I do not know what to ask
I'd like to know what type of questions you can answer for me.
Can you please give me a list of the types of things you can help me with?
Can you tell me what services you are able to help me with?
Do you have a list of things I can talk to you about?
Can I speak to a live person?
Can I connect to an agent?
Is there anyone there I can actually talk to for real?
I need to speak to a representative. How would I go about doing so?
I don't want to talk to you
I don't want to talk to a bot.
I would like to speak to someone
I would like to speak to a human
I want to talk to a person
I want an agent to help me
Please let me talk to a human being.
Please connect me to a live agent
Please assist me to get to an agent
Can I speak to a human please?
Can you assist me to connect to an agent?
Can you connect me with a real person?
Connect me to a live operator please.
Could you please transfer me to your master?
Yes, take me to a real person
Can I speak to an advisor?
How can I skip the recorded menu and go straight to a live person?
I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)
I like what you did there! :)
Can't believe you are that good
You gave me exactly what I need!
How much does a life insurance policy cost?
How much should I pay for auto insurance policy?
Do you offer a policy which doesn't cost me a fortune?
Can you share indicative rates for a car insurance policy?
Can you help me out in evaluating the best price for buying a travel insurance?
Would you be able to provide me a list of estimated price an auto insurance would cost?
Compare your personal liability protection with others
Can I get cost estimation for my policy?
What's the lowest price for the insurance?
What is the most basic policy?
What is the cost for buying an agriculture insurance?
What are the charges for buying an insurance policy?
Please tell me the price that will be charged for insurance
I would like a quote for firm protection
I want to get my group insured. will you be able to tell me the cost of a group insurance policy
I don't know how to estimate cost of a policy
I am interested in your most advanced policy.

intents.description: Request a price estimate on a policy.

examples.text: What is the EMI for this plan?
What does the EMI come upto?
How much EMI should I pay?
How do I download the policy to see?
What's the full amount of things which the plan covers?
Can I view the details of the agreement?
Can you please show me my insurance policy?
I want to look at policy terms.
I would prefer to view the contents of the contract
What is the start date of insurance?
What is the expiration date of my health insurance?
Where is the contract for insurance?
What is link to download insurance policy?

intents.description: View the details of a policy.

description: This is the bot for the Code Pattern

values: Is there anything else I can help you with?

output.text: Enter a protection type. Select one among Basic Life Cover, Fixed Income Protection or Increasing Income Protection.

values: Please tell me your Name followed by Date Of Birth and Annual Income
Your $frequency premium for $term years under the $protection_type plan is 67767 dollars. Do you want to try any other options or go ahead with buying this?
I will need your annual income to proceed further

output.text: Please enter a term ranging between 10 years to 35 years.
What premium payment frequency would you prefer? Monthly, Quarterly, Half Yearly or Yearly?

values: Our company ranks 5 as per IRDAI.
Claims settled by our company till date amounts to 2,576 crores.
The claims settlement ratio for our company is 95.6%
I will need your Date of Birth to proceed further

output.text: Please enter your Date of Birth

values: Income Protection Insurance (IPI) is an insurance policy, available principally in Australia, Ireland, New Zealand, South Africa, and the United Kingdom, paying benefits to policyholders who are incapacitated and hence unable to work due to illness or accident.

Term life insurance or term assurance is life insurance that provides coverage at a fixed rate of payments for a limited period of time, the relevant term. After that period expires, coverage at the previous rate of premiums is no longer guaranteed and the client must either forgo coverage or potentially obtain further coverage with different payments or conditions.

output.text: Sorry, I could not understand your response. Please try again.

values: You have come to the right place We offer you a smart, affordable and convenient way to safeguard the future for you and your family. Can I ask you a couple of questions to come up with the best plan for you?
On death during the Policy term, Sum Assured as a lump sum is paid to the nominee and the policy terminates.

Fixed income refers to any type of investment under which the borrower or issuer is obliged to make payments of a fixed amount on a fixed schedule. For example, the borrower may have to pay interest at a fixed rate once a year, and to repay the principal amount on maturity.

output.text: Hi! How can I help you?
Hello. How can I help you?

counterexamples.text: Tell me what is basic life cover
